song.verse: We have heard the joyful sound:## Jesus saves! Jesus saves!## Tell the message all around:## Jesus saves! Jesus saves!## Bear the news to every land,## Climb the steeps and cross the waves;## Onward! 'Tis our Lord's command:## Jesus saves! Jesus saves!

Waft it on the rolling tide:## Jesus saves! Jesus saves!## Say to sinners far and wide:## Jesus saves! Jesus saves!## Sing, ye islands of the sea,## Echo back, ye ocean caves;## Earth shall keep her Jubilee:## Jesus saves! Jesus saves!

Give the winds a mighty voice,## Jesus saves! Jesus saves!## Let the nations now rejoice,## Jesus saves! Jesus saves!## Shout salvation full and free,## Highest hills and deepest caves,## This our song of victory,## Jesus saves! Jesus saves!
